metadata.Title: CVE-2022-27943 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: libiberty/rust-demangle.c in GNU GCC 11.2 allows stack consumption in demangle_const, as demonstrated by nm-new.

notes.Note: sbeattie> gcc-3.3 only provides libstdc++5 litios> affected code introduced in gcc-11.1.0 on 2020-11-13 with 84096498a7b ("libiberty: Support the new ("v0") mangling scheme in rust-demangle") litios> affected code introduced in binutils in d750c713 eslerm> fixed in gcc-13.1.0 on 2022-07-01 with 9234cdca6ee ("Add a recursion limit to the demangle_const function in the fixed in binutils-2_39 on 2020-01-31 with f10f8617a30 ("Import patch from mainline GCC to fix an infinite recusion in the Rust demangler.")

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
